#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>

int main()
{
   long long int r=0;
   while (r<=50)
   {
    long long int n;
    scanf("%lld",&n);
    if (n != 0)
    {
        long long int i=0, arr[n], sum = 0;
        while (i<n)
        {
            scanf("%lld",&arr[i]);
            sum += arr[i];
            i++;  
        }
        long long int equal = sum/n;
        long long int u=0, bro = 0;
        while (u<n)
        {
            if (arr[u] > equal)
            {
                bro += arr[u];
                bro -= equal;
            }
            u++;
        }
        printf("Set #%lld\nThe minimum number of moves is %lld.\n",(r+1),bro);
    }
    else{
        break;
    }
    r++;
   }
    return 0;
}
